DOC.brief_summary: Prior study examine pharmacokinetics , safety , efficacy new etonogestrel-containing single rod implantable contraceptive device , Implanon , include woman exceed 130 % ideal body weight . Yet , woman comprise significant portion U.S. population , study Implanon obese woman essential . The propose study represent important first step address lack data Implanon obese woman . We aim examine pharmacokinetics Implanon obese woman first 6 month use provide data acceptability , side effect profile , ease insertion , palpation , removal woman . We also aim collect sample future validation study use blood spot ( finger-stick blood sample filter paper ) method determine plasma etonogestrel .
DOC.criteria: premenopausal uterus least one ovary willing able sign inform consent willing comply study protocol visit schedule body mass index less 25 , great equal 30 weight stable know suspected pregnancy delivery ( vaginal cesarean ) within 4 month device insertion abortion ( first second trimester ) within 4 month device insertion contraindication Implanon use hemophilia undiagnosed abnormal genital bleeding hypersensitivity allergy component Implanon personal family history thrombosis thromboembolic disorder hepatic tumor active liver disease know suspected carcinoma breast history breast cancer one cardiovascular risk factor hypertension diabetes known history PCOS , diabetes , glucose abnormality present use use within 2 month device insertion CYP3A4 inducer breastfeed woman use investigational drug within 2 month device insertion use injectable contraception within 6 month device insertion plan pregnancy next 12 month know HIV infection smoking age 35
